text: Wonderful place with the owner/manager working his butt off. He was the only server on a Friday night, so it obviously took a bit longer to get our food. However, we ordered an appetizer and small complimentary samples are provided for each table. That kept us entertained while food arrived. For being a busy Friday night, our food was made correctly and was delicious. Nice to see someone put his heart and soul into his work.
